dashboard.card_total_post.title: Total post
dashboard.card_total_post.text: All posts created across all platforms connected to Lovelace (Discord, Steam, Reddit, etc.)

dashboard.card_engagement.title: Engagement rate
dashboard.card_engagement.text: • Engagement Rate shows the percentage of your community that actively interacts with your content over a selected time period.

dashboard.card_new_subs.title: New Subs / Followers
dashboard.card_new_subs.text:
• Number of new followers or members across all platforms connected to Lovelace.
• By default, calculated over the last 30 days. (You can adjust the period with the calendar filter.)

dashboard.card_total_subs.title: Total Subs / Followers
dashboard.card_total_subs.text: Total number of followers, subscribers, or members across all connected platforms (Discord, Steam, Reddit, etc.).

dashboard.card_interactions.title: Interactions
dashboard.card_interactions.text:
• Any direct interaction from a user (like posting, commenting, reacting)
• Replies to a post
• Mentions related to your project

This measures the active participation of your community beyond just following or observing.

dashboard.card_wishlist.title: Wishlist steam
dashboard.card_wishlist.text: • You had them at "Add to Library" ...they're just waiting for payday.

dashboard.game_ranking.title: Game Ranking
dashboard.game_ranking.text: Overall game ranking based on the selected platform's reviews.

dashboard.sentiment_overview.title: Sentiment Overview
dashboard.sentiment_overview.text: Sentiment score calculated from user reviews on the selected platform.

dashboard.engagement_overview.title: Engagement Overview
dashboard.engagement_overview.text: Graph of combined engagement data (likes and posts) over the selected period (default 30 days).

dashboard.interactions_per_day.title: Interactions per Day
dashboard.interactions_per_day.text: Daily interactions graph aggregated from all games over the selected period (default: 30 days)

dashboard.global_insights_score.title: Only on score
dashboard.global_insights_score.text: Average relevance score based on posts mentioning this insight.

insight.global_overview_feedback.title: Global Overview Feedback
insight.global_overview_feedback.text: Summary of key strengths, improvement areas, and recommended actions based on player feedback.

insight.global_overview_bugs.title: Global Overview Bugs
insight.global_overview_bugs.text: List of main issues and negative feedback reported by players.
